stories.title: Factors to consider when architecting systems that uses third-party systems

stories.text:
I've seen posts about people posting what they were doing about the bar being so low in tech. So I decided to post my own affairs.

I currently have 50 roles in tech; what I am doing is essentially outsourcing the labor to India, Poland, Nigeria, and Argentina. I am, basically, running an outsourcing company at this stage and have people process and handle requests in those countries and assign engineers. I learned a ton about quality control and am making 7.5M a year. I am able to juggle the work because most of my gigs are in startups and meetings rarely happen so i'm pretty much running on autopilot.
